TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TextQuality extends System.Enum

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Specifies the text rendering settings for the AmbientTheme class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TextQuality> allows users to determine whether the text displayed on a workflow design surface, and all its child designers, is antialiased or aliased. Antialiased text provides higher quality text display, while aliased text requires fewer resources to maintain.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TextQuality Aliased = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The ambient text quality setting is aliased.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TextQuality AntiAliased = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The ambient text quality setting is antialiased.
